thread.title: Mandy Moore and Shane West Had the Sweetest A Walk to Remember Reunion
thread.title_full: Mandy Moore and Shane West Had the Sweetest A Walk to Remember Reunion

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Mandy Moore and Shane West Had the Sweetest A Walk to Remember Reunion
text:
Mandy Moore and Shane West Instagram Picture February 2017 Mandy Moore and Shane West Had the Sweetest A Walk to Remember Reunion February 6, 2017 A photo posted by Adam Shankman (@adamshankman) on Feb 6, 2017 at 9:32am PST 
A Walk to Remember turns 15 this year, and the film's stars celebrated by having a little reunion. On Sunday, Mandy Moore posted a sweet selfie with her onscreen love interest Shane West and the director Adam Shankman, who also shared his own picture on Instagram. "Welp. These 2 gentlemen are still some of the best around," she captioned the snap. "Loved catching up with ya, @theshanewest and @adamshankman. My ‚ù§ is full. #awalktoremember #reunion." This isn't the first time Moore and West have made us emotional over the movie's anniversary. Aside from posting a number of throwback shots on social media, they recently opened up about their most memorable moments on set , in which the This Is Us star admitted to kind of, sort of, falling in love with her costar while filming. I mean, do you blame her? Hopefully Moore and Shankman will share more pictures from their reunion soon! Feb 5, 2017 at 10:27pm PST Related:
